page.title: 14CROWLE INDUSTRIES
page.content: THE {OLD BLACKSMITH'S SHOP}IS NOW A STORE PLACE FOR THE AGRICULTURAL ENGINEER. HIS FIRM NOW MAINTAINS MODERN FARM MACHINERY, SUCH AS CULTIVATORS AND PEA VINERS. MANUFACTURING ORNAMENTAL IRON GATES AND STAIRCASES IS ANOTHER PART OF HIS JOB. THE{PLANT-HIRE FIRM}USES EARTH-MOVING EQUIPMENT ON TRACKS. THESE EASILY TRAVEL OVER ROUGH TERRAIN. THIS SAME FIRM HAS LARGE DUMPER TRUCKS FOR MOVING EARTH OVER LONGER DISTANCES. THE HY-MAC MACHINE CUTS LARGE DYKES AND DIGS LARGE HOLES. IT IS, AT PRESENT, IN USE EXTENDING THE EALAND LAKE. ANOTHER FIRM DOES {PRECISION MACHINING}OF ALL METALS. THEY MANUFACTURE SPARE PARTS FOR THE STEELWORKS AND WIREWORKS. THESE THREE LOCAL FIRMS COMPRISE THE INDUSTRY IN CROWLE AND EMPLOY LOCAL MEN .
